errors.VLD_000: Draft is currently not expecting actions
errors.VLD_001: Acting user is not supposed to act according to preset
errors.VLD_002: Action is unexpected according to preset
errors.VLD_100: Civilisation has been banned globally before
errors.VLD_101: Civilisation has been banned before for same player
errors.VLD_102: Civilisation has been exclusively picked before by the same player
errors.VLD_103: Civilisation has been globally picked before by either player
errors.VLD_200: Civilisation has been exclusively banned before by same player
errors.VLD_300: Civilisation has not been picked before by opponent
errors.VLD_301: The opponent does not have a non-sniped pick of the civilisation
errors.VLD_900: The server could not process the preset properly
errors.VLD_901: The preset contains an invalid sequence of parallel turns
errors.VLD_902: The preset contains a parallel turn that does not require player interaction
errors.VLD_903: The preset contains a parallel turn which is followed by a turn that does not require player interaction
errors.VLD_904: The last turn of the preset is a parallel turn, which is not possible
errors.VLD_905: The preset contains a parallel turn which is to be executed by the same player as the next turn
errors.VLD_906: The preset contains a hidden ban and a pick without a reveal turn in between
errors.VLD_907: The preset contains a hidden turn that is never revealed
errors.VLD_908: The preset does not contain any turns

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.1: Captains mode is a turn-based civilization picker. Each captain can <1>pick</1> and <3>ban</3> civilizations in a predefined order. Bans prevent the opponent's captain from picking the civilizations.
instructions.2: For each turn captains have <1>120 seconds</1>. In case of timeout a random civilization is picked for the captain or no civilization gets banned.
instructions.3: There are also extension available for tournaments. <1>Hidden</1> option (black corners) hides the civilization choices until they are explicitly showed (visible in the timeline at the top).
instructions.4: <0>Global</0> pick or bans disables the civilization for later turns. For other specific settings, please refer to the preset descriptions.
instructions.5: <0>Practice</0> mode is for testing purposes, where both sides are controlled by a single player.

createNewDraft: Create new draft from this Preset

codeInstructionsAfter: Use this code to spectate this draft again later:
